Html: Been using RAWR for awhile now. I just downloaded 4.2.1 RAWR. I was wondering why the drastic change from Haste to Mastery. I was 1600+ Haste, now its telling me to go to 1600+ Mastery, and my Haste is down to 1300+ when I did what Optimize told me to do. I lost alot of DPS on my stat board in-game. Is there an issue going on I haven't found at the website or is this for real?
